Blog.post: i was just wondering waht type of things you guys and galls are interseted in? Well i want to know because you read my blogs and profile and well i havent found how to read others so yea.

" True friends are like diamonds presious and rare, false friends are like autum leaves found every where." -Nick Rice I have many close friends who are in some type of military branch. I dont know what i would do if I ever found out that something happened to them. So Im asking you to please say a little prayer for them or just to keep them in your heart. It would mean a lot to me if you would and i bet it would mean the world to them. Thank you for your time and remember to keep a soldier in you heart.

"The greatest thing in life you'll ever learn is just to love and to be loved in retrun." -Molon Rogue I know i cant spell for beans. I went on to sergios blog and read the one bout Kita. If you are reading this Sergio, i miss her too i wish she didnt have to live in alabama. Ne ways it was hard for all of us to let her go, but we will get through it together. (o and kita CALL ME) I miss her laughter but if i want to hear it all i have to do is just laugh myself(hehe inside joke!) But really kita if you are ever in town give me a halla you know ill get back to ya. love ya lots bye

Im visiting my dad and family up in Houston TX. Im here til the 16th of Aug. (ya i know im going to miss the first three days of school) Its fun up here i have 2 brothers and 2 sisters, my dad and stepmom. Also we have these friends who are a blast, but i miss everyone back home. My mom i miss the most, then all my friends. everyone in VLR, my peps from summer school, hell i even miss Cpt. and 1st Srg. Yall better not have forgotten bout me or ill just have to kick your ass. Ne ways dont have to much fun with out me and if you ever need to talk you can ALWAYS call me on my cell. love ya lots.
